testcase.name: Verify product selection, cart functionality, and total amount in General Store App
testcase.system-out: Given I open the General Store app on an android device.....................passed When I select "Egypt" from the country dropdown.............................passed And I enter my name as "Hesham Abd Elhamed" in the text field...............passed And I select "Male" as my gender............................................passed And I click on the Letâ€™s Shop button........................................passed Then I add the first product to the cart....................................passed And I add the second product to the cart....................................passed When I navigate to the cart screen..........................................passed Then I verify that the selected products are displayed in the cart..........passed And I assert that the total amount equals the sum of the two products' values.passed Then i close the android app................................................passed
